directions: Place fruit in large punch bowl. Sprinkle with sugar to taste, if desired; stir and let stand 10 minutes for sugar to dissolve and juices to form. Add all remaining ingredients except ice cubes. Divide punch among 8 tall ice-filled glasses and serve.
ingredients: 4 cups assorted fresh fruit (such as berries, pitted cherries, and pitted sliced apricots and peaches)
title: Negroni Punch
